credit_line: Gift of the artist and her husband, Mr. George Hedges, Class of 1897
title: Portrait of Ebenezer Fitch (1756-1833), First President of Williams College 1793-1815
inscriptions: l.r. in oil: Marjorie B. Hedges; verso: Rev. Ebenezer B. Fitch D.D./ First President of Williams College/ 1793-1815/ Born September 26 1756/ Died March 21 1833/ Painted by Marjorie B. Hedges
